Thumper, you are a joke.

This is no way to pack software. Piracy means first and foremost transparency.

Password protected pack = very wrong. What would be the purpose of this? Hiding from me the stupid icons you use?

No instructions = wrong
Donate button = wrong
All-automated patch process = very wrong

WE ARE NOT CHILDREN.

It took us a long way to get rid of the no-question asked installation procedures of MS back in the day. 

You have no clue.

If you wanna distribute software, pack the damn thing in a rar file so that I know what's in it and what I am clicking on.
